ValidationRule.description: If Flex HR Rating = "Not Complete", then force an entry in the Online Access not setup or the Flex HR Rating Notes field
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Flex_HR_Rating__c,"Not Complete"), ( NOT(Online_Access_not_setup__c) && ISBLANK(Flex_HR_Rating_Notes__c) ), $Profile.Name <>"System Administrator" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must populate the Online Access not setup or the Flex HR Rating Notes field when setting Flex HR Rating = Not Complete.
